name: Recipe: Omelette Rice
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Omelette Rice.

value.name: Bird Egg
value.desc: An incredibly versatile ingredient that can supply all of your daily protein needs.

value.name: Rice
value.desc: A grain crop commonly found in Teyvat. People of all walks of life enjoy its distinct grainy texture. As the saying goes, "The same kind of rice can feed one hundred kinds of people."

value.name: Tomato
value.desc: A bright red ingredient that gives a tangy kick. Yes, the "fruit or vegetable" debate is still going...

value.name: Sugar
value.desc: A seasoning derived from Sweet Flowers. Has the power to give both energy and happiness.

value.name: Omelette Rice
value.desc: A main dish wrapped up in an egg skin. The evenly beaten egg fluids are fried into half-doneness before being poured out on top of the rice, and tomato ketchup is drizzled over top afterward once it is ready to plate up. They say that this dish was derived from another region, though this version involves a more complicated cooking method.

value.name: Kuki Shinobu
value.desc: The capable and reliable deputy leader of the "Arataki Gang." Please note: capable and reliable are not appellations for the "Arataki Gang," but for their deputy leader in specific.

value.name: Omurice Waltz
value.desc: Kuki Shinobu's specialty. The soft egg skin almost seems to dance upon a stage made from sauce, with fluffy rice wrapped under its swaying skirt. This would even be a match for the work of Uyuu Restaurant's head chef. Truly, Shinobu's chef license was not earned in vain.

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Purchase from Shimura Kanbei at Shimura's Restaurant</color>
